meanings.definition: Preventing or treating disease with drugs
meanings.sent1: The chemoprophylactic helped keep the illness away.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed a chemoprophylactic to prevent the spread of the infection.
meanings.sent3: The chemoprophylactic was like a shield against sickness.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of chemoprophylactic was her armor in the battle against disease.
meanings.sent5: The chemoprophylactic was a powerful weapon in the fight for health.

meanings.definition: A drug used to prevent disease
meanings.sent1: He took the chemoprophylactic to avoid getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The chemoprophylactic was effective in stopping the illness from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The chemoprophylactic was like a superhero pill against diseases.
meanings.sent4: The chemoprophylactic acted as a guardian shield against infections.
meanings.sent5: The chemoprophylactic was a lifesaver in preventing outbreaks.
